messages.subject: Cowboy Bob's Website Overhaul (Correct link)
messages.msgSnippet: Everyone, Thanks for all the prompt replies. In my haste I did not proof read the address. The old site was a .html the new site is .htm oops. So here is the
messages.messageBody:
Everyone,

Thanks for all the prompt replies. In my haste I did
not proof read the address. The old site was a .html
the new site is .htm oops. So here is the correct site
URL.

http://asia.geocities.com/gentleman9/index.htm

If this one does not work I'll end up pulling my hair
out but let me know.

Bob R

=====
Check out "Cowboy" Bob's Books & Things at:
http://asia.geocities.com/gentleman9/index.htm
